column4: Hello, my ubuntu isnt letting my get a resolution any higher than 640x480 on my DVI monitor, and to bypass this I had to plug in a second monitor with VGA.  But my main monitor is still stuck on a very low resolution.  Can anyone help me with this?
whats your video card? are you running this OS in virtual host?
The Os is on dualboot with Windows 7, but it is on a seperate hard-drive.  The GPU is a GT 240,  Running latest version of Ubuntu, with latest Nvidia Drivers install through Root.
